title: Panic Breaks Out Over The Ukraine Bio-Labs Story (Ep 1722)
description:
In this episode, I address the media and Biden administration panic over the Ukrainian bio-labs story. I also discuss the outrageous lies by the Biden administration about energy and oil. 

News Picks:


Are we being lied to about those “bio-labs” in Ukraine?


Ted Cruz shreds Joe Biden’s dopey excuses. 

The “fact-checkers” are heroes of the left. France is calling for more “fact-checking.” 


Inflation is going to get uglier as we continue to spend more money we don’t have. 

The just-released inflation number is horrific.

This is really bad news about Keystone pipeline. 


How to defend America against a Russian nuclear attack. 


Serious concerns about the 2020 election.
